metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1947 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
fetchmail 5.9.9 through 6.3.19 does not properly limit the wait time after issuing a (1) STARTTLS or (2) STLS request, which allows remote servers to cause a denial of service (application hang) by acknowledging the request but not sending additional packets.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fetchmail - 6.3.26-1
fetchmailconf - 6.3.26-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.26-1').
